releaseNotes: It has been a good rollercoaster ride working on this project. However, it is time to say goodbye!

From this stressful legal experience, we've have learned to appreciate the damage apps such as RedFlix TV do to those who invest their time, effort and money to create motion pictures. We now plan to fully respect intellectual property laws and strongly urge those who used our app to use legal apps to watch content. Thank you for your love and support fam.
You can try our friends app, KingoTV by clicking on the update button!
Signing off one last time, with love,
